string-array.name: story_choices
string-array.item: "One day %1$s was %2$s and they saw a %3$s cat. The cat cast a spell and turned %1$s %4$s."

"Once upon a time %1$s lived by themselves. They loved %2$s. But, one day while they were %2$s they had a vision of a %3$s %4$s pickle. %1$s was so upset they started %2$s home and never went %2$s again... :("
